ygData.subject: something to check in Akanon...
ygData.msgSnippet: Where did you find DusterX and how often does it spawn?  I ve killed DusterV a number of times.  I ve also seen a CleanerX, but never a DusterX.  I really want
ygData.messageBody:
Where did you find DusterX and how often does it spawn? I've killed DusterV a number of times. I've also seen a CleanerX, but never a DusterX. I really want to finish this quest and it's bugging me that I can't find it after hours of searching.

Gnizer (11th level Gnome Rogue of Cazic-Thule)

>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
<snip>
also tried the Red V, C series clockwork, and obsolete duster quests but got
no new info...anyone remember where the akanon quest to kill the duster in
kaladim starts?

Xillitil/Povar
